archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: One brass pin, issued by the Australian Department of Defense, bearing the legend, "Volunteered for Active Service Medically Unfit."

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: World War I Brass Pin, 1914, in the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection, Accession #10875-as, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was given to the University of Virginia Library by William Norris of Victoria, Australia, through Matthew J. Bruccoli on July 23, 1996

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection consists of a brass pin, ca. 1914, bearing the legend, "Volunteered for Active Service Medically Unfit," issued by the Australian Department of Defense to Cyril William Norris (1893-1970). The pin also bears the Australian national seal featuring a kangaroo and an emu.
